sentence.Network_en: Hooky, naturally, has to prove his machismo by going on the scariest rides twice.
sentence.Network_cn: 胡基自然要坐两次最恐怖的过山车来表现一下自己的男子汉气概了。

sentence.Network_en: The bus driver drove with machismo through a tangle of marrow streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 公共汽车司机得意洋洋地驱车在狭小的街巷中穿行.

sentence.Network_en: Curiously, a certain 10 machismo exists that I didn't expect.
sentence.Network_cn: 说来也怪, 这里充斥着一种我没有料到的阳刚之气.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 钻油业一向被认为是充斥男子气概（machismo）的产业。还记得《世界末日》（Armageddon）这一部由麦可贝（Michael Bay）执导 …
...是永远的，作为一个男性天才的缩影，在今天我们称之为大男子主义(Machismo)。
◤V7T9&gt;&gt;原创◆◇小韦版二十字...欢迎大家... ... Lactation（ 哺乳） Machismo（ 男子汉气概） Newspaper（ 报纸）.
...无能感，控制感与被压迫感，地位感与卑微感，虐待感和男人本色(machismo)感与去势感。”

list.abs: at 2 strands of DNA , this creates a machismo man and a subordinate woman .在2股DNA，这创造了一个阳刚的男人和一个顺从的女人。
配乐用了不少小鼓和小号而洋溢军乐风，在暴虐（cruel）和雄纠纠（macho machismo）的层面多所著墨，洗礼、站直角、偷考卷、化学考试、鸭步走、跳墙等都有改编呈现，还出现了小说没有写到的1.
I was trying to marshal my machismo ., 我试图整理我的情绪.
At 2 strands of DNA , this creates a machismo man and a subordinate woman ., 在 2 股 DNA , 这创造了一个阳刚的男人和一个顺从的女人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s: from Mexican Spanish, from macho 'male', from Latin masculus

entry.tran: 男子汉气概;大男子主义
entry.def: You use machismo to refer to men's behaviour or attitudes when they are very conscious and proud of their masculinity.

example.ex: Hooky, naturally, has to prove his machismo by going on the scariest rides twice.
example.tran: 胡基自然要坐两次最恐怖的过山车来表现一下自己的男子汉气概了。
